Based on your preferences and the given movies, I would recommend "Easy A." This movie stars Emma Stone, who you mentioned as one of the most talented actors in Hollywood.

"Easy A" tells the story of a high school girl named Eliza (played by Emma Stone)) who discovers that she is the only person in her town who has never had sex.

Determined to "change her", Eliza enlists the help of a group of local men who are also determined to "change their".

Together, Eliza and the local men set out on a series of missions designed to "change their" by teaching them about sex and relationships.

As Eliza and the local men embark on their series of missions, they encounter a variety of obstacles, including rival factions, treacherous terrain, and unexpected twists and turns that keep audiences on the edge of their seats.

Despite encountering a variety of obstacles, Eliza and the local men ultimately succeed in their series of missions designed to "change their" by teaching them about sex and relationships.

In the end, "Easy A" is a heartwarming and entertaining movie that offers plenty of laughs and感动 for audiences who enjoy movies that are funny, exciting, and romantic.
